description_txt: stated on March 7, 2012 in her column.:
quote_txt: Says Gloria Steinem once called Kay Bailey Hutchison a "female impersonator."

description_txt: stated on March 19, 2012 in a news release:

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: "Medicare will be bankrupt in nine years."

description_txt: stated on February 29, 2012 in an interview with reporters following presentation of improved lottery revenues.:
quote_txt: "Right now we have sufficient reserves to take care of Tennessee's lottery scholarship students for a few years more."

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2012 in a Fox News interview.:
quote_txt: Says you need a photo ID to purchase Sudafed in Texas.

description_txt: stated on March 8, 2012 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says the Wisconsin Republican Party tweeted "Happy International Women's Day! You ladies should get paid less and not be able to make health care decisions."

description_txt: stated on February 24, 2012 in a web ad:
quote_txt: Says U.S. Rep. Connie Mack "took seven and a half years to finish college."

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2012 in a chain email.:
quote_txt: Says a Barack Obama "black imposter" joke got a standing ovation at San Angelo rodeo.

description_txt: stated on March 25, 2012 in a campaign appearance in Wisconsin:
quote_txt: Says Mitt Romney said "we are going to have to live with high gas prices, it's a good thing because it will reduce consumption, we don't want to produce any more gasoline."

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2012 in an interview on NJToday:
quote_txt: Says Congressman Bill Pascrell "voted to remove the public option from the Affordable Health Care Act."

description_txt: stated on March 7, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: "The state [food stamp call center] program is administered from foreign shores."

description_txt: stated on March 12, 2012 in a news release:

description_txt: stated on March 14, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Says when Rhode Island Lottery was proposed, "state residents were enticed to vote for it with the promise that the money would be used for education."

description_txt: stated on March 22, 2012 in a Web video:
quote_txt: "Up to 80 percent of small businesses will be forced to give up their current plans due to new Obamacare regulations."

description_txt: stated on March 20, 2012 in a web video ad:

description_txt: stated on February 24, 2012 in a House committee debate:

description_txt: stated on March 14, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: New federal projections estimate that the health care overhaul "will cost $1.76 trillion over 10 years -- well above the $940 billion Democrats originally claimed."

description_txt: stated on March 21, 2012 in a web video:
quote_txt: Says that while President Barack Obama promised to "work with your employer to lower your premiums by $2,500 per family per year," his health care law "raises premiums in the individual market by $2,100 per family."

description_txt: stated on March 21, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: Since Florida passed the "stand your ground" law in 2005, deaths due to self-defense have jumped over 250 percent.

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says when he was governor, Wisconsin cut unemployment to 2.1 percent and the state’s unemployment rate was "the lowest in the country for 40 consecutive months."

description_txt: stated on March 15, 2012 in a campaign e-mail:
quote_txt: Says under the new health care law "the patient-doctor relationship will be eliminated."

description_txt: stated on March 19, 2012 in a statement.:
quote_txt: The CBO says the cost of health care reform will rise to $1.8 trillion, "increasing the price to far greater than the $900 billion" originally projected.

description_txt: stated on March 21, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: The changes to Georgia’s tax and fee structure "is an overall tax cut."

description_txt: stated on March 12, 2012 in an interview on PoliticsNation with Al Sharpton on MSNBC:
quote_txt: "The poorest in this country are women."

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says a study shows that children who live with a biological parent and the parent's boyfriend or girlfriend "have a 20 times greater chance of being sexually abused."

description_txt: stated on February 23, 2012 in an interview on MSNBC's "Morning Joe" program:

description_txt: stated on March 20, 2012 in a talk radio show.:
